quoteText: The Shipping Labels TOS is governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the State of Oregon, United States of America, without regard to principles of conflicts of laws. Â The parties irrevocably and unconditionally submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of the State of Oregon with respect to any dispute or claim arising out of or in connection with the Shipping Labels TOS.
title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.
tosdr.tldr: The court of law for Discogs is located in the State of Oregon, USA. The United States have implemented some laws that are detrimental to the privacy of users of US-American services, most noticeably the PATRIOT Act.
